plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.shop.effect

接口 ShopEffectHandler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FreezeCreeperEffect, GiveItemEffect, HealTraderEffect

    public interface ShopEffectHandler
    Interface for shop effect handlers. Implementations handle specific effect types like GIVE_ITEM, HEAL_TRADER, FREEZE_CREEPERS.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean apply(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Arena arena, ArenaContext context, org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection effectConfig)
      Apply the effect to the player/arena.
      java.lang.String getEffectType()
      Get the effect type this handler supports.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getEffectType

        java.lang.String getEffectType()
        Get the effect type this handler supports.

      • apply

        boolean apply(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
              Arena arena,
              ArenaContext context,
              org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection effectConfig)
        Apply the effect to the player/arena.
        参数:
        player - The player who purchased
        arena - The arena instance
        context - The arena context
        effectConfig - The effect configuration section
        返回:
        true if effect applied successfully
